colorTheory.description: This palette combines high contrast text and background colors with a vibrant accent color for visual interest.
colorTheory.mood: The palette conveys a sense of professionalism and clarity while maintaining visual appeal.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures readability for all users.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary and secondary colors create a strong foundation, while the accent color adds a pop of energy.
